StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: I have more than 2 years of experience in developing Informatica MDM solutions and is having a firm grip over core JAVA, PLSQL, SQL. I am also a passionate coder with good knowledge in Data Structures & Algorithms. Other languages that I have used while coding is mainly C & C++.

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 100% of this job

PositionHistory.Description: I was trained during this period of time in Informatica ETL and SQL(Oracle). Technology used - Oracle (SQL), PLSQL. Tools used - Informatica PowerCenter

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 100% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Programmer Analyst - Informatica MDM developer
PositionHistory.Description: to Nov 2017 Working as an Informatica MDM Developer for a leading global pharma company. Here I have contributed in developing a Global Customer Management which will create a unique ID for Individual/Organizations which will then be used by downstream for various purposes. Alongside I have also worked in Global Product Master whose goal was to produce unique product ID and maintain the hierarchy of products. Here, I have learned to configure HUB (tables, mappings, M/M & validation rules, HM), SIF APIs, JAVA/DB User Exits, IDD etc. Also had to perform activities like data loading, data remediation, service restart etc. on an adhoc basis. Technology used - Java 8, Oracle (SQL), PLSQL, JBOSS. Tools used - Informatica MDM, Informatica PowerCenter

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 78% of this job

Degree.Comments: UG: B.Tech/B.E. (Information Technology) from Institute of Engineering and Management in 2017
